# [Interview #1094: Salt Lake City Comic-Con 2014, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1094#40)

#### Question

Is Odium mad about Sazed having two Shards?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, and scared.
